articles.title: Tom Brady just revealed that his dog Junie is a clone of Lua, his deceased furry friend
articles.description:
Brady said he partnered with a biotech company that he invested in to collect a blood sample from his old dog and clone her.

The post Tom Brady just revealed that his dog Junie is a clone of Lua, his deceased furry friend appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tom Brady revealed his dog Junie is a clone of Lua, his late pet.
Brady partnered with a biotech company he invested in for the cloning process.
This highlights advancements in pet cloning technology, potentially influencing local veterinary practices.

articles.title: Running unopposed, Michelle Wu secures second term as her national profile grows
articles.description:
Having recently been dubbed a "young-ish Democrat to watch," Wu, a mother of three, is now set to serve the next four years as mayor.

The post Running unopposed, Michelle Wu secures second term as her national profile grows appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Michelle Wu secures a second term as Boston mayor, running unopposed in the recent election.
Wu, a mother of three, will serve a four-year term starting immediately.
Her growing national profile may influence local policies and initiatives in Boston.

articles.title: At least 4 dead, 11 injured in UPS plane crash and explosion at Kentucky airport
articles.description:
Video showed flames on the plane's left wing and a trail of smoke. The plane then lifted slightly off the ground before crashing and exploding in a huge fireball.

The post At least 4 dead, 11 injured in UPS plane crash and explosion at Kentucky airport appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: At least 4 people died and 11 were injured in a UPS plane crash in Kentucky.
The incident occurred on November 4, 2025, impacting UPS operations nationwide.
Boston residents may experience delays in package deliveries due to the crash.

articles.title: Tell us: What should Mayor Wu focus on in her second term?
articles.description:
As Wu prepares for another four years leading the city, her next priorities remain an open question.

The post Tell us: What should Mayor Wu focus on in her second term? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mayor Wu prepares for her second term starting in January 2026.
Residents are invited to share priorities for Wu's upcoming four years.
Focus areas may significantly affect housing, public safety, and climate initiatives in Boston.
